    Exit, Ruby and You (2012-03-23)

  • My name is Renato Mascarenhas and I am a brazilian CS student. I'm passionate about writing code which is clean and easily testable. Also fast. Among other things.

    This blog, as any personal blog, will cover topics as they come to my mind. Mostly regarding Ruby and C programming. Unix tricks also interest me a lot.

    Me, @tenderlove and @benegripe

    Oh, and if you want to contact me just mail me, and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

    Sunrise or sunset?
